import React from "react"; import './hero-section.css' import {Container, Row, Col} from "reactstrap"; import heroImg from '/assests/hero-img.png' const HeroSection = () => { return

Добро пожаловать в мой мир!

Hi

I am Bakirov Ildar

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Asperiores ipsum omnis praesentium? Consequuntur dolores nemo nesciunt quae, reiciendis similique voluptas?
} export default HeroSection
